text: @NYGovCuomo IMO @BernieSanders Medicare4All would be much more effective in situation like #coronavirus.  Rather than 1 state Governor ordering for profit companies in 1 state to modify their HC out of pocket 💰, a M4ALL plan could move swiftly accross Nation to ensure all have testing etc.
